name: AWOL
text: Remove target attacking creature from the game. Then remove it from the removed-from-game zone and put it into the absolutely-removed-from-the-freaking-game-forever zone.

flavor: "Step 1: I believe in a power and toughness greater than myself . . . ."
name: Bosom Buddy
text: Whenever you play a spell, you may gain ½ life for each word in that spell's name.

name: Cardpecker

Flying
Gotcha Whenever an opponent touches the table with his or her hand, you may say "Gotcha" If you do, return Cardpecker from your graveyard to your hand.
